name: Therme Mindful blossom anti-transpirant spray
composition: INGREDIENTS: BUTANE, ISOBUTANE, CYCLOPENTASILOXANE, PROPANE, ALUMINUM CHLOROHYDRATE, PARFUM, DIMETHICONE, DISTEARDIMONIUM HECTORITE, DIMETHICONOL, PROPYLENE CARBONATE, TALC, LINALOOL, HYDROXYCITRONELLAL, HEXYL CINNAMAL, LIMONENE, GERANIOL, CINNAMYL ALCOHOL, CITRONELLOL.
